Imagine you just ate a delightful hamburger with a side of french fries and soda from a diner chain. When you go to another diner's location, you eat another, much more refined, slightly changed hamburger, with a side of salad. Now imagine you go to a final location which serves you a hamburger that has like two improvements but the waiter stepped on it, the chef spat on it, maggots are infested inside of it, and the patty was missing.
only get it for gmod stuff

One would think the developers would play the game through at least once before releasing it, but it would appear that is not the case. Several annoying bugs make the game unplayable, as in making it impossible to continue from that point. Also frequent display and other glitches give you the impression of a proof of concept rather than a product.
Just play Black Mesa and forget about this.

to be honest with you all the stupid over sights in this game didnt bother me, its just the normal half life exerience but with some small things different here and there, although i wouldnt recommend it over the original half life, its a good way to still play it if you dont mind the stupid shit that sometimes happens

After Steam Pipe in 2013 this game was simply broken, the hitboxes were clearly made to fuck off marousia I'm fucking now. Reflections are broken, just walk into a dark room where you can see the floor polished to a shine and the reflections of some cube in the weapons. The biggest loss of this version of Half-Life is its bloodiness - they cut it here too. The verdict is that Vanilla is the power, HL:Source is the grave.

P.S. I bought this purely for the gmod.

The only reason I would recommend this game is for Mods, Ragdoll Physics or Garry's Mod. Buy Goldsrc Half-Life instead. There are many bugs, like when you are in the room near the test chamber a scientist is floating above his chair, the conveyor belt part in residue processing the skybox breaks through the map, and that one part where you are near some mines and some snipers are in some buildings the skybox is just broken. The weapons are also SUPER shiny, when you use the HD models the scientists neck breaks. And that's barley scratching the surface of all the bugs.

No. Just get the original Half Life. Or if you are broke and you bought this instead, just get the Half Life Source Fix mod on moddb. Search it up and you'll have fixed game. Source engine buggy this time

Can i just say, if you're looking to buy this in 2022 and not sure if its worth it, it is 100 percent worth every single penny

I, for one, did not play this game back in its heyday (coz i wasn't alive) so I'm not going off of any nostalgia here when i say this, but this is one of the most perfectly crafted first person shooters i have ever played in my life. It has the perfect blend of fps. horror, story and puzzle solving, and the map/world design honestly was way way ahead of its time. Physics are still unmatched by a lot of AAA game studios to this day and the game does a really good job of nudging you in the right direction without holding your hand along the way. I know people say late game felt a little rushed and the last boss is kinda meh however i actually didn't mind Xen and the levels following.

The narrative is a little hard to follow however the whole premise of the story is masterclass, there are little things that you pick up on each time you play through it again which also add to the backstory, it truly made me appreciate and like half life 2 a whole lot more.

DO NOT let the year it was released put you off, it was way ahead of its time and is still a solid 10/10 game for me, get it. get it right now.

The default game is pretty buggy, luckily there are mods that fix that. This port is mainly just good if you are looking to mod half-life without the limitations of the goldsrc engine. But if you are looking to play just regular half life, then you should just buy the original game, But there is some good that comes out this port.

Although this version of original Half-Life has some glaring differences from the vanilla, this is still good, old-fashion HL in play.  It's worth a playthrough just to pick out the niggles between the two.
